demo.paragraph: Welcome to ClimatePartner. We have created your user account.
demo.copy:
After you activate your account, you can log in at any time using this link: <u>https://app.climatepartner.com
</u>
If your account activation has expired, of if you have any other questions simply contact us at: 
+ 49 89 122 875-10 or <u>support@climatepartner.com </u>

demo.subline.79: View this email in your browser.
demo.body-text:
A new password was recently requested for your ClimatePartner account. 

To reset your password, click here <u>[link]</u>. 

If you did not request this change, please reset your password immediately or contact us: <u>support@climatepartner.com 
</u>
To keep your account safe, please do not forward this email to anyone. ClimatePartner will never store or share your password with anyone.
